meanings.definition: Occurring or appearing at irregular or infrequent intervals.
meanings.sent1: My occasional visits to the park always bring me joy.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys the occasional movie night with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat's occasional attempts at singing are quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The occasional burst of laughter echoed through the room.
meanings.sent5: The occasional rain showers made the garden glisten in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Happening from time to time; infrequent.
meanings.sent1: His occasional forgetfulness often leads to funny situations.
meanings.sent2: We have occasional family gatherings during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The occasional dance moves of the penguin made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The occasional gust of wind carried the leaves across the yard.
meanings.sent5: The occasional shooting star lit up the night sky with magic.

meanings.definition: Intended for use on special occasions.
meanings.sent1: She wore her occasional dress to the elegant dinner party.
meanings.sent2: The bakery offered occasional treats for festive celebrations.
meanings.sent3: The occasional fireworks display lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent4: The occasional candle flickered softly on the dining table.
meanings.sent5: The occasional champagne toast marked the beginning of a new year.
